channel.title: *Need Help* (has picture) Error: loaderror Unpacking media 80
channel.description:
Now I was adding a donator icon from this form *http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/308663-317-adding-donator-crown-client-sided.html* and had to fix some things so i would not get compiling errors yet when i started the client i got the loaderror unpackign media 80 heres the picture of what I have done.
1.added the donator icon 2.and everything highlighted
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/11kfpqq.png[/img]

item.title: *Need Help* (has picture) Error: loaderror Unpacking media 80
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

how will this effect my client sprites?

Read full topic

item.title: *Need Help* (has picture) Error: loaderror Unpacking media 80
item.dc:creator: @Abdi2400 Abdi2400
item.description:
@Abdi2400 wrote:

Add this to your class30_sub2_sub1_sub1:

[code=cpp]public Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(String s, int i)
{

    ImageIcon imageicon = new ImageIcon(s);
    imageicon.getIconHeight();
    imageicon.getIconWidth();
    try
    {
        Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(FileOperations.ReadFile(s));
        anInt1440 = imageicon.getIconWidth();
        anInt1441 = imageicon.getIconHeight();
        anInt1444 = anInt1440;
        anInt1445 = anInt1441;
        anInt1442 = 0;
        anInt1443 = 0;
        anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
        PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
        pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
    }
    catch(Exception exception) { }

if (s.startsWith(“icondon”))
{
try
{
anInt1440 = 15;
anInt1441 = 15;
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./sprites/icondon.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

}
catch(Exception exception) {}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
